channel.title: Demolitionx
channel.description: Hey guys so I made a final decision to start the project that I had been contemplating to start. I am looking for the least coded 474 server that I can find and run off of that. I will be doing all of the coding myself unless I find someone that can be dedicated but that's also laid back and just codes in their spare time. If you have any servers to suggest for me to base off of please post here, I will be looking also. I will keep this thread updated.

item.title: Demolitionx
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

T_R: Deven isn’t new here, by any means.

Deven: This is T_R, a very egotistical, but creative member of these forums.

OT: We now have a “General Server Discussion” section, use it to ask people what base you should use, also, don’t post unless you’ve done anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Demolitionx
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Post a Developmental Log so people can see what YOU have done so far. This not only lets Members see the effort being put into it, but it will also keep you motivated. Here’s an example of what I mean:

Key: SS = Server-sided, CS = Client-sided

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

  • Magic Tab cleaned out for the Tzhaar Magic Tab. (CS)

  • Potion and other UseItem content has been removed. (SS)

  • Player Death has been removed. (SS)

  • Fishing, Crafting, Mining, and virtually all non-combat Skills have been removed. (SS)

  • All Classes have been reorganized and have had their conventions corrected. (SS)

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Ranged Combat has been removed. (SS)

  • Dual Zoom Camera functions added. (SS/CS)

  • New Sprites added onto the Client Tabs. (CS)

  • Player V.S. Player Combat removed. (SS)

  • Massive amounts of dead/useless code removed. (SS)

  • Cleaned over 700KB of code. (SS)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Oh my god, not this again. You have been making threads for a year now, and every time someone gives you contrsuctive critizm you go off saying you quit the project and you hate the community. You also never finish them. I’ve tried supporting all the others but this time don’t quit and don’t use a gay name.

item.title: Demolitionx
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:6, topic:468573”][quote author=devenb123 link=topic=585544.msg4159542#msg4159542 date=1352935757]
Once again, please make an intelligent comment. Check my profile, I am obviously not new here.
[/quote]

An intelligent comment based on what…? You don’t even have a Base to work with yet. Why post a Server Development Topic?[/quote]
This. There is no need for a Server Dev. topic if you don’t even have a base. Just because you’re looking for people and a way to start that doesn’t qualify for a server dev. topic. Ask around, no one is going to offer to help with you.
Since you’ve been here so long, you must have connections with some people.
By the way, looks like people will pay for your service so you must have an idea on what to use since you’re “expecting them to pay for hard services”
What is a hard service, btw?

Read full topic
